markdownRemark.html:
Howdy, y’all!

So, June and July have been some hectic months. I moved to Texas, started a new job and have been slowly getting settled in and exploring my new city.

frontmatter.title: A Brief Catch Up & Currently Reading
frontmatter.description: After a short hiatus, I figured it was time to provide a brief update as to what has been going on in life and provide a brief list of some of the best things I've been reading lately.

frontmatter.title: Making Money isn't About Luck -- My Thoughts
